content: गुप्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [गुप्-भावे क्तिन्] {@--1@} Preserving, protection; सर्वस्यास्य तु सर्गस्य गुप्त्यंर्थ <ls>Ms. 1. 87</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 1.">94</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 1.">99</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 198.</ls> {@--2@} Concealing, hiding. {@--3@} Covering, sheathing; असिधारासु कोषगुप्तिः <ls>K. 11.</ls> {@--4@} A hole in the ground, a cavern, sink, cellar. {@--5@} Digging a hole in the ground. {@--6@} A means of protection, fortification, rampart; <ls>Ku. 6. 38.</ls> {@--7@} Confinement, prison; सरभस इव गुप्तिस्फोटमर्कः करोति <ls>Śi. 11. 60.</ls> {@--8@} The lower deck of a boat. {@--9@} A leak in a ship. {@--10@} Check, stoppage.
